alert.note: Alert for Lewiston Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 10:08AM MST until January 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Localized accumulations up to 6 inches for elevations above 2000 feet. * WHERE...Lewiston, Clarkston, Pomeroy, Lewiston Grade, Gifford, Lapwai, Alpowa Summit, Culdesac, and Peck. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
